launch_landsat_explorer: Launch the Landsat Explorer in a new tab
launch_sentinel_1_explorer: Launch the Sentinel-1 Explorer in a new tab
launch_sentinel_2_explorer: Launch the Sentinel-2 Explorer in a new tab
launch_landcover_explorer: Launch the Sentinel-2 Land Cover Explorer in a new tab
add_scenes_to_list: Add scenes to this list to create a chronological animation.
compare_and_report_changes: Compare and report changes between two selected images. Change is always calculated and reported chronologically from oldest to newest.
complete_check_browser_downloads: Complete! Check browser downloads for the MP4 file.
select_two_scenes: Select two scenes, SCENE A and SCENE B, and then click VIEW CHANGE.
dynamic_view_instruction: To select an individual scene for a specific date, try the FIND A SCENE mode.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong and the app has crashed.
app_temporarily_unavailable: This app is temporarily unavailable due to an issue fetching data from one of the data services.
click_to_copy_coordinates: Click to copy the coordinates of this location
mask_tool_tooltip: Spectral reflectance values can be used to compute a variety of indices. Different thresholds can be applied to these spectral indices to mask and highlight different characteristics of the Earth's surface.
clipping_mask_info: Show selected index pixels as a clipping mask, rather than as a solid color.
select_scene_to_calculate_mask: Select a scene to calculate a mask for the selected index.
select_scene_and_click_location: Select a scene and click a location within that scene to generate a temporal profile for the selected category.
select_scene_sepctral_profile: Select a scene and click on the map to identify the spectral profile for the point of interest.
spectral_profile_info: The spectral reflectance of different materials on the Earth's surface is variable. Spectral profiles can be used to identify different land cover types.
save_map_view_as_image: Save this map view as an image
select_acquisition_date: Select an acquisition date in Calendar to find a scene.
scenes_displayed_based_on_intersection: Scenes are displayed based on their intersection with the map's center.
submitting_raster_analysis_job: Submitting the raster analysis job. Please do not close the browser tab.
title: Title
name_already_exists: This name already exists. Please choose a unique name.
text_too_long: The text is too long. Please keep it under {{maxLength}} characters.
estimated_cost: The estimated cost of this task is {{estimatedCost}} credits.
dialog_can_be_closed: This dialog can safely be closed while request is processed.
sign_in_to_your_account: Sign in to your ArcGIS Online account
publish_scene_description: Publish a hosted imagery layer of the selected scene. This capability consumes credits and requires activation by your organization administrator. It also requires a minimum of a Professional User Type and Publisher role.
publish_index_mask_description: Publish a hosted imagery layer of the current index mask. This capability consumes credits and requires activation by your organization administrator. It also requires a minimum of a Professional User Type and Publisher role.
publish_change_detection_description: Publish the output change detection mask as a hosted imagery layer. This capability consumes credits and requires activation by your organization administrator. It also requires a minimum of a Professional User Type and Publisher role.
publish_web_app_description: Create an instance of this application in its current state as a web application.
publish_webmap_description: Create a web map containing the selected scene as a layer.
publish_multi_layers_webmap_description: Create a web map with individual layers per scene.
publish_single_layer_webmap_description: Create a web map with a single layer with multiple scenes.
publish_scene_hosted_imagery: Publish Scene as an Imagery Layer
publish_index_mask_hosted_imagery: Publish Index Mask as an Imagery Layer
publish_change_detection_hosted_imagery: Publish Change Detection as an Imagery Layery
publish_current_state_web_app: Publish Current State as a Web Application
publish_scene_webmap: Publish Scene as a Web Map
publish_multi_layers_webmap: Publish Scenes as Multiple Layers Map
publish_single_layer_webmap: Publish Scenes as Single Layer Map
job_type_publish_index_mask: Index Mask as an Imagery Layer
job_type_publish_change_detection: Change Detection as an Imagery Layer
job_type_save_web_app: Current State as a Web Application
name: Name
interetsing_places_data_source: Information contained in the Interesting Places descriptions was sourced from Wikipedia.
renderer_tooltip: {{satellite}} sensors collect imagery at distinct ranges along the electromagnetic spectrum. These "bands" of imagery can be combined to create renderings of the Earth for a variety of applications.
copy_link_tooltip: Copy link to this app in its current state
temporal_profile_tooltip: The least cloudy scenes from the selected time interval will be sampled to show a temporal trend for the selected point and category.
sign_in_to_save_jobs_description: Sign in to your ArcGIS Online account first to use the save options.
animation_graph_disabled_message: Graph is disabled when animation is on
zoom_to_see_change_graph: Zoom in to see Land Cover Change Graph
zoom_to_see_totals_graph: Zoom in to see Land Cover Totals Graph
swipe_mode_zoom_message: Zoom in to compare {{layerName}} Imagery Layers
animate_mode_zoom_message: Zoom in to enable time slider
animation_load_failed: Animation failed to load, please exit and try again
